mapper.select: select com.comId, comName comPhone, comEmail, businessNum, comIntro, comProfile, bno, bid.conNo, price from tbl_company com INNER join tbl_bidder bid on com.comId = bid.comId where bid.conNo = #{conNo} group by com.comId order by bno desc limit #{skip},#{size}
select count(conNo) from tbl_bidder where conNo = #{conNo};
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_bidder (conNo, comId, price) VALUES (#{conNo},#{comId},#{price})
mapper.update: update tbl_bidder set state =1 where comId = #{comId} and conNo = #{conNo} and price=#{price}
update tbl_bidder set price = #{price} where comId = #{comId} and conNo = #{conNo} and state =1
update tbl_bidder set delFlag=1 where comId = #{comId} and conNo = #{conNo}
